backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update requiring exact personalized Valentine success-screen text.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all main frontend files used in the Valentine SPA.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH variables for theming and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders the ValentinePage component.
frontend/src/components/ValentineActions: Renders Yes/No buttons and tracks No interactions to trigger hiding after repeated hovers/clicks.
frontend/src/components/ValentinePage.ts: Controls the transition between the prompt view and success view based on Yes selection.
Displays the Valentine question and handles No button interaction count to hide it after 3 attempts.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSuccess: Shows the success message, meme image, and personalized text with romantic styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Main Tailwind theme file defining romantic color tokens and global styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and mounts to DOM.
frontend/src/publishSlug.ts: Defines and validates the deploy slug 'romantic-valentine' against platform rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color palettes using CSS variables, custom radii, shadows, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for a romantic interactive Valentine web app.
